sentences.sContent: They succeeded in the experiment on the fifteenth trial.
sentences.sContent_eng: They succeeded in the experiment on the fifteenth trial.
sentences.sCn: 他们在第十五次试验时获得了成功。

sentences.sContent: Lantern Festival falls on the fifteenth day of the first lunar month. This is the first full moon of the new year, symbolizing unity and perfection.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lantern Festival falls on the fifteenth day of the first lunar month. This is the first full moon of the new year, symbolizing unity and perfection.
sentences.sCn: 元宵节是农历正月的第十五天，这是新年的第一次满月，象征着和睦和团圆。元宵节是春节的一个重要组成部分，也象征着春节长假的正式结束。

words.tran: 第五十的；五十分之一的
十五；十五个；十五人组成的橄榄球队
